description: Made with movement and comfort in mind, our Women’s Hudson Trail Fleece Jacket gives you the best of both. Super soft, recycled brushed wool fleece helps keep you warm while a perfectly roomy fit keeps you moving seamlessly. This fabric helps you brave the elements, wherever the trail takes you.
name: Hudson Trail Fleece Jacket - Womens

specs.value: 45% Recycled Wool, 45% Polyester, 5% Nylon, 5% Other Fibers
